name: Eowyn
keyTraits: Gentle and loving pup, always ready to offer snuggles and affection. Calm and serene natureâ€”happiest when by your side, bringing peace and joy to your day.

name: Echo
keyTraits: Playful and energetic, always bouncing around, but also has a gentle side that loves quiet snuggles. Favorite thing is curling up at your feet for a nap.

name: Ginger
keyTraits: Playful and energetic, always ready for a game, but also has a sweet and cuddly side. When the day winds down, will happily curl up next to you for some quiet time.

name: Jacey
keyTraits: Playful and curious, often investigating new sounds or toys with tail wagging excitedly. When ready for a break, will snuggle right up to you, showing gentle and affectionate side.

name: Jada
keyTraits: Gentle and observant, pausing to take in new sights and sounds. Shows spirited side during playtime, chasing toys and tumbling around, always ready to share a loving snuggle afterward.

name: Jamie
keyTraits: Playful and adventurous, never hesitating to pounce on toys or explore. When time to relax, is the perfect cuddle buddy, nuzzling close and soaking up all the affection you have to offer.

name: Jetta
keyTraits: Curious and spunky, always eager to explore new things or chase after a rolling ball. When excitement winds down, loves curling up close for quiet cuddles.

name: Jovie
keyTraits: Gentle and playful, often nudging a toy toward you to join in on the fun. When ready to unwind, loves curling up in a cozy spot, soaking up all the love and security around.

name: Jules
keyTraits: Outgoing and playful, loving every moment to chase after toys or meet new friends. When ready to rest, curls up next to you, showing affectionate side and enjoying all the cuddles.

name: Lana
keyTraits: Graceful and gentle with love for all things cozy. Calm and observant, preferring to watch before jumping in. Favorite thing is being close to humans, soaking up all the love and attention.

name: Bernadette
keyTraits: Gentle, always careful and kind with everyone. Curious, exploring and sniffing out new adventures. When time to relax, affectionate, curling up beside you for some quiet snuggles.

name: Blanche
keyTraits: Regal demeanor and calm presence. Graceful, moving with elegance and poise. Loyal, always staying close to favorite humans. Playful, loving good game when mood strikes.

name: Hope
keyTraits: Here to brighten your day! Always wagging tail and spreading good vibes. Gentle enough to be everyone's favorite cuddle buddy. Devoted side - will show you love every single day.

name: Haley
keyTraits: Loves cuddles as much as exploring the world. Curious and playful, always ready to chase toys or discover something new. When tuckered out, will melt into your lap for a cozy nap.

name: Luna
keyTraits: Gentle and affectionate, happiest when snuggled up next to you or gazing at you with big puppy eyes. Also has a playful streak and loves chasing after toys.

name: Lyra
keyTraits: Calm and thoughtful pup who loves to observe before jumping into action. When not napping in the sun, quietly following you around, ready to be your shadow.

name: Mabel
keyTraits: Calm and easygoing pup, happy to relax by your side. When mood strikes, playful and energetic side comes out. Incredibly loyal, always sticking close to favorite humans.

name: Maisie
keyTraits: Spunky and confident pup, always ready to take on the world. Also has a sweet and cuddly side, loving nothing more than curling up for belly rubs. Mischievous streak will keep you on your toes!

name: Amara
keyTraits: Affectionate, always looking for belly rubs and snuggles. Calm, happy to relax by your side while you read or watch TV. When time to play, spirited, bringing energy and joy.

name: Aria
keyTraits: Sweet girl who loves bringing smiles! Playful, smart, and total cuddle bug, always ready for fun game or cozy nap by your side. Favorite thing is making everyone laugh with silly antics.

name: Beatrice
keyTraits: Intelligent, picking up new tricks and commands quickly. Calm, happy to sit by your side and enjoy quiet moments. When time to play, spirited, bringing energy and joy to every game.

name: Mercedes
keyTraits: Graceful and elegant pup, always carrying herself with poise. Has playful streak and loves zooming around. When time to relax, gentle and affectionate side shines through, happily curl up in your lap for snuggles.

name: Nadine
keyTraits: Gentle and affectionate pup, always ready to curl up for snuggles after a fun day. Incredibly curious, loving to explore new places. Playful yet calm nature, perfect mix of energy and sweetness.

name: Sonnet
keyTraits: Gentle girl with personality as poetic as her name. Loves quiet moments, soft pets, and sharing peaceful times with family. Searching for pup who will bring calm and comfort to home.

name: Starling
keyTraits: Sweet and graceful with curious nature and eye for all things interesting. Adores exploring the world but loves nothing more than curling up for snuggles after day of fun. Equal parts playful and serene.

name: Sundae
keyTraits: Sweet little girl who's just as delightful as her name! Playful antics will have you smiling, and snuggles will warm your heart. Sweet, fun-loving, and always ready to brighten your day.

name: Jinny
keyTraits: Playful and happy spirit. Also calm and mild-mannered, making perfect balance of fun and relaxation. Will be your loyal companion, ready to brighten your day with sweet and steady nature.

name: Josie
keyTraits: Gentle and affectionate, always looking for a lap to rest head on or hand to give belly rubs. Favorite thing is being close to humans, making every moment together feel extra special.

name: Bonnie
keyTraits: Cheerful personality and wagging tail that never stops. Bubbly, always full of energy and excitement. Friendly, making fast friends with everyone. When day winds down, snuggly, curling up in your lap.

name: Candy
keyTraits: Sweet and colorful pup who's always ready to brighten your day. Playful and energetic, bouncing around like on sugar rush, but also has gentle and affectionate side that loves quiet moments.

name: Catan
keyTraits: Expressive eyes will have you wrapped around paw! Adventurous and clever, always strategizing next move, but also has calm and cuddly side when game slows down. Ready to settle into your heart.

name: Nana
keyTraits: Laid-back and easygoing pup, happiest lounging by your side or soaking up belly rubs. Has silly, playful streak that comes out for games. Incredibly loyal, will always be your shadow, following wherever you go.

name: Nessie
keyTraits: Happy-go-lucky pup who's always wagging tail and spreading joy. Super smart, picking up new tricks and commands in no time. Friendly and outgoing personality, makes fast friends with everyone.

name: Shelby
keyTraits: Bold and confident pup, always ready to take the lead on any adventure. Also has sweet and loyal nature, sticking by your side no matter what. Playful and goofy side will keep you laughing.

name: Tesla
keyTraits: Clever and curious pup, always exploring and figuring out how things work. Also has calm and cuddly side, perfect for quiet evenings at home. Zippy and energetic personality, always ready to go full charge!

name: Glinda
keyTraits: Easygoing, sweet nature means happiest just being by your side. Calm, gentle, and loves to nap in cozy spots, but will always perk up for a belly rub or quiet stroll.

name: Gigi
keyTraits: Total cuddle bug who loves making eye contactâ€”way of saying 'You're my favorite person.' Affectionate, calm, and happiest when curled up in your lap or following you around the house.

name: Skye
keyTraits: Energetic, friendly, and curious, always eager to explore the world and meet new friends. Whether chasing the breeze or enjoying a quiet moment, will bring little sunshine to your day.

name: Stella
keyTraits: Playful and curious, always ready to explore new places or chase after a ball. Also gentle and affectionate, will happily curl up next to you for some quiet snuggles after a day of fun.

name: Zelda
keyTraits: Calm and affectionate, loving nothing more than to curl up by your side, but also has mischievous streak that keeps life interesting. Loyal and loving, will always be your little shadow wherever you go.

name: Zoe
keyTraits: Playful and curious, always exploring new corners and chasing after toys, but also gentle and cuddly, happiest when snuggled up in your lap. Quick learner too, so teaching tricks will be breeze!

name: Lilly
keyTraits: Super smart and loves to stay in the loop, never missing a thing with watchful eyes and curious mind. Calm and laidback nature, combined with playful, affectionate, and attentive personality.

name: Pocahontas
keyTraits: Calm and gentle pup, but absolutely loves when it's playtimeâ€”will happily chase a ball or romp around with favorite humans. Sweet and playful companion who's always ready for fun.
